00020   using namespace std;
00021 
00022   const Math::real CassiniSoldner::eps1 =
00023     real(0.01) * sqrt(numeric_limits<real>::epsilon());
00024   const Math::real CassiniSoldner::eps2 = sqrt(numeric_limits<real>::min());
00025 
00026   void CassiniSoldner::Reset(real lat0, real lon0) throw() {
00027     _meridian = _earth.Line(lat0, lon0, real(0));
00028     real phi = LatitudeOrigin() * Constants::degree();
00029     _sbet0 = _earth._f1 * sin(phi);
00030     _cbet0 = abs(LatitudeOrigin()) == 90 ? 0 : cos(phi);
00031     Geodesic::SinCosNorm(_sbet0, _cbet0);
00032   }
00033 
00034   void CassiniSoldner::Forward(real lat, real lon, real& x, real& y,
00035                                real& azi, real& m) const throw() {
00036     if (!Init())
00037       return;
00038     real dlon = Geodesic::AngNormalize(lon - LongitudeOrigin());
00039     real sig12, s12, azi1, azi2, m12;
00040     lat = Geodesic::AngRound(lat);
00041     sig12 = _earth.Inverse(lat, -abs(dlon), lat, abs(dlon),
00042                            s12, azi1, azi2, m12);
00043     if (sig12 < 100 * eps2)
00044       sig12 = s12 = 0;
00045     sig12 *= real(0.5);
00046     s12 *= real(0.5);
00047     if (s12 == 0) {
00048       real da = (azi2 - azi1)/2;
00049       if (abs(dlon) <= 90) {
00050         azi1 = 90 - da;
00051         azi2 = 90 + da;
00052       } else {
00053         azi1 = -90 - da;
00054         azi2 = -90 + da;
00055       }
00056     }
00057     if (dlon < 0) {
00058       azi2 = azi1;
00059       s12 = -s12;
00060       sig12 = -sig12;
00061     }
00062     x = s12;
00063     azi = Geodesic::AngNormalize(azi2);
00064     GeodesicLine perp = _earth.Line(lat, dlon, azi2);
00065     m = Scale(perp, sig12);
00066 
00067     real
00068       sbet1 = lat >=0 ? perp._calp0 : -perp._calp0,
00069       cbet1 = abs(dlon) <= 90 ? abs(perp._salp0) : -abs(perp._salp0),
00070       sbet01 = sbet1 * _cbet0 - cbet1 * _sbet0,
00071       cbet01 = cbet1 * _cbet0 + sbet1 * _sbet0,
00072       sig01 = atan2(sbet01, cbet01) / Constants::degree();
00073     real latx, lonx, azix, m12x;
00074     y = _meridian.Position(sig01, latx, lonx, azix, m12x, true);
00075   }
00076 
00077   void CassiniSoldner::Reverse(real x, real y, real& lat, real& lon,
00078                                real& azi, real& m) const throw() {
00079     if (!Init())
00080       return;
00081     real lat1, lon1;
00082     real azi0, m0;
00083     _meridian.Position(y, lat1, lon1, azi0, m0);
00084     GeodesicLine perp = _earth.Line(lat1, lon1, azi0 + 90);
00085     real sig12 = perp.Position(x, lat, lon, azi, m0);
00086     m = Scale(perp, sig12);
00087   }
00088 
00089   Math::real CassiniSoldner::Scale(const GeodesicLine& perp, real sig12)
00090     const throw() {
00091     if (sig12 == 0)
00092       return 1;
00093     // Result is symmetric in sig12, however numerical accuracy is better if
00094     // sigc-sig2 is smaller.
00095     sig12 = abs(sig12) * Constants::degree();
00096     // Point on meridian, sigma = pi/2
00097     real
00098       // ssig1 = 1, csig1 = 0,
00099       dtau1 = Geodesic::SinSeries(real(1), real(0), perp._tauCoeff,
00100                                   Geodesic::ntau),
00101       dzet1 = Geodesic::SinSeries(real(1), real(0), perp._zetCoeff,
00102                                   Geodesic::nzet);
00103     // Find semi-conjugate point -- initial guess, sigma = pi
00104     real ssigc = 0, csigc = -1;
00105     real wc, dtauc, dzetc;
00106     for (unsigned trip = 0, numit = 0; numit < maxit; ++numit) {
00107       wc = sqrt(1 + perp._u2 * sq(ssigc));
00108       dtauc = Geodesic::SinSeries(ssigc, csigc, perp._tauCoeff, Geodesic::ntau);
00109       dzetc = Geodesic::SinSeries(ssigc, csigc, perp._zetCoeff, Geodesic::nzet);
00110       real
00111         sig1c = atan2(-csigc, ssigc),
00112         et = (1 + perp._taufm1) * ( dtauc - dtau1 ),
00113         ez = (1 + perp._zetfm1) * ( dzetc - dzet1 ),
00114         j1c = ( (perp._taufm1 - perp._zetfm1) * sig1c + (et - ez) ),
00115         v = - 2 * wc * csigc * ssigc + 2 * sq(csigc) * j1c;
00116       if (abs(v) <= eps2 || trip > 1)
00117         break;
00118       real dv = - 2 * wc * (1 - 2 * sq(ssigc)) - 4 * csigc * ssigc * j1c;
00119       real dsig = -v/dv;
00120       real
00121         sdsigc = sin(dsig),
00122         cdsigc = cos(dsig),
00123         nssigc = ssigc * cdsigc + csigc * sdsigc;
00124       csigc = csigc * cdsigc - ssigc * sdsigc;
00125       ssigc = nssigc;
00126       if (abs(v) < eps1)
00127         ++trip;
00128     }
00129     // Scale meridian to conjugate
00130     real m1c = - sqrt(1 + perp._u2 ) * csigc;
00131 
00132     // Target point, sigma = sig12 + pi/2
00133     real
00134       ssig2 = cos(sig12), csig2 = -sin(sig12),
00135       dtau2 = Geodesic::SinSeries(ssig2, csig2, perp._tauCoeff, Geodesic::ntau),
00136       dzet2 = Geodesic::SinSeries(ssig2, csig2, perp._zetCoeff, Geodesic::nzet),
00137       et = (1 + perp._taufm1) * ( dtauc - dtau2 ),
00138       ez = (1 + perp._zetfm1) * ( dzetc - dzet2 ),
00139       sig2c = atan2(ssigc * csig2 - csigc * ssig2,
00140                     csigc * csig2 + ssigc * ssig2),
00141       j2c = ( (perp._taufm1 - perp._zetfm1) * sig2c + (et - ez) ),
00142       // Scale target to conjugate
00143       m2c = ((wc * csig2 * ssigc -
00144               sqrt(1 + perp._u2 * sq(ssig2)) * ssig2 * csigc)
00145              - csig2 * csigc * j2c);
00146     return m2c/m1c;
00147   }
